alert.note: Alert for Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 20 at 8:53PM CDT until April 22 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Sunflower River At Sunflower affecting Sunflower County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yazoo River At Yazoo City affecting Yazoo County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yazoo River At Yazoo City. * WHEN...Until late Thursday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 29.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM CDT Wednesday was 29.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue falling to 27.2 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Yazoo River Yazoo City 29.0 29.4 Wed 7 pm CDT 28.7 27.9 27.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 900 AM CDT.
